name: Club de Detectives: Caso 01
storyline:
Due to changes in the school regulations, it will now be mandatory to belong to a club. You, the protagonist of this story, will be part of the "Detective Club" when you meet Alice Baskerville, a clueless and somewhat childish girl. From the beginning, things are not going well at the club... It is in danger of being closed!

Together with Alice and a nice pet, you will have to solve your first case: find the stalker of a popular girl. For this, you will have to carry out interrogations, deduce important clues, solve puzzles and find the correct argument in a debate. The future of the club depends on your skills as a detective!
summary: Visual novel of comedy and mystery.
